text: 1.4: 2 Ko 7.4; 7.14; 1 Te 2.19; VB 1.9Mba bigɨna nɨɨeŋra, nza Fhe Bakɨmen siosi ga ruav, nza nde zɨri ndiv vun kuamkuagi. Nza nden pana gumgi nde mbui tɨvi mbatɨgi, nza nta bun mbe nzuav, nden hi simtɨgi, nza vhɨra nta bun nzuai. Nza mbe nzuav khaŋ nzuai, “Tesaronaikaiŋ mbe thɨga havhargiap, Zisas khothɨgap, ana zɨn vui tɨva suirav, mben hi simtɨgi gu zaagi, mbe nta ndi.”
